name: Fehlverhalten_HAEBDK_NEU
doc: This schema describes a log file using the Apache Avro 1.8.0 Specification. For reference see https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.8.0/

fields.name: NR
fields.doc: Sequential number for the log event (REQUIRED)

fields.name: Datum
fields.doc: Event date as the number of milliseconds from the unix epoch, 1 January 1970 (ISO calendar) (REQUIRED)

fields.name: EventNr
fields.doc: An internal event code that is either a null (i.e. optional), string or int. (OPTIONAL)

fields.name: ErledigtDatum
fields.doc: Completion date as the number of days from the unix epoch, 1 January 1970 (ISO calendar) (optional)
